Definition: The direction an Undergoer moves in during a motion or change of value on a scale event.

The resulting physical form that an Undergoer is in at the end of an event.

Definition: The light that a Theme emits.
The Material that has been used to change a Patient by the end of an event.
Indicates the movement manner of an event.
The smell that a Theme emits.
The position that a Participant is in.
Comments: Appears in spatial_configuration-47.6, put_spatial-9.2, and assuming_position-50.

Definition: A placeholder for the prepositional direction of a transfer event.

Definition: A property of a Participant or the event.

Definition: The sound that a Theme emits.
